
######################################
# AUTOGENERATED on 2025-07-20 00:22:54.900776                #
######################################


#cognitive #leader_trait_army_veteran #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_army_veteran_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_army_veteran
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_army_veteran = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_army_veteran }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_army_veteran show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_army_veteran_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_army_veteran
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_army_veteran
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#cognitive #leader_trait_buccaneer_3 #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_buccaneer_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_buccaneer = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_buccaneer }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_buccaneer_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}


#cognitive #leader_trait_politician #common
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_politician_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_politician
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_politician = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_politician }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_politician show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_politician_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_politician
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_politician
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		}
	}
}

		}

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}

			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_spark_of_genius }

		}
		hidden_effect = {

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_trailblazer_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_trailblazer = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_trailblazer }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_trailblazer_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_trailblazer_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes

		}
		has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
	}

		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_common

		}

			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_common = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}

#cognitive #leader_trait_cartographer_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_cartographer_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_cartographer_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_cartographer = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_cartographer }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_cartographer_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_cartographer_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_cartographer_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies_3 } }
	}

			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		has_ancrel = yes
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies_3 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_expertise_archaeostudies_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#cognitive #leader_trait_expertise_biology_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_expertise_biology_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_biology_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_biology_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_biology = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_expertise_biology }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_expertise_biology_3 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_biology_3 }

}


#cognitive #leader_trait_expertise_propulsion_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_expertise_propulsion_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_propulsion_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_propulsion_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_propulsion = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_expertise_propulsion }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_expertise_propulsion_3 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_expertise_propulsion_3_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_propulsion_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_propulsion_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_expertise_propulsion_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}
}


#cognitive #leader_trait_expertise_psionics_3 #veteran
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_expertise_psionics_3_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_psionics_3 } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_psionics_3
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_expertise_psionics = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_veteran
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_expertise_psionics }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_expertise_psionics_3 show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_expertise_psionics_3 }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_expertise_psionics_3
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_expertise_psionics_3
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
		}
	}

		}

		}

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = subclass_scientist_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}

	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_brilliant_shipwright }
	}

				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}

		}

oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_educator_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator } }

			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes

			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_educator }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_educator show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_educator_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_educator
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_educator
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#cognitive #leader_trait_great_researcher #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_great_researcher_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_great_researcher } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_great_researcher
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_great_researcher = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = subclass_scientist_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_great_researcher }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_great_researcher show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_great_researcher_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_great_researcher }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_great_researcher
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_great_researcher
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#cognitive #leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = subclass_scientist_councilor }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_knowledge_for_the_masses
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}


#cognitive #leader_trait_master_bureaucrat #paragon
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat_add_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat } }
	}
	allow = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_scientist_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
		oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_trait_picks = yes
			oxr_mdlc_leader_scientist_can_add_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat = yes
			#oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_check_leader_has_required_subclass = { CLASS = scientist SUBCLASS = None }
		}
		
	}
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_show_trait_total_cost_paragon
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { TRAIT_NAME = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
			add_trait = { trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat show_message = no }
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_deduct_trait_pick = yes
			}
		}
	}
}
oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_cognitive_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat_remove_button_effect = {
	potential = {
		event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = { has_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat }
	}
	allow = { always = yes }
	effect = {
		custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_scientist_leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
		hidden_effect = {
			event_target:oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_target_@root_0 = {
				remove_trait = leader_trait_master_bureaucrat
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
				oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_pick = yes
			}
			oxr_mdlc_councilor_editor_refund_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
		}
	}
}
